item.description:
Child Rights and You (CRY) Boston Presents:

Walk for Child Rights 2010
"From Couch to Ouch: Stay active, be healthy, give back!"


http://america.cry.or...

Walk/Run for Child Rights, Walk/Run for a Change!
Sunday, Aug 29, 2010 at 9:00 A.M. | Minuteman Bikeway, Arlington, MA
5 KM Walk/Run | 2 KM Walk for Kids | Kids Games | Free T-shirt, food & drinks!

15$ (Adult), 25$ (Couple), 10$ (Team of 10+), 10$ (Student), Free for Children under 10


Venue:
Minuteman Bikeway (across Alewife T station and right next to Thorndike Field)

Parking Instructions:
http://www.minutemanb...
item.name: Walk for Child Rights 2010: From Couch to Ouch!!
